panels.description: Ports that aren't responding to pings (using CPingmesh).

targets.expr:
min by (host, nic) (increase(pingmesh_server_pings_total{host=~"$system", nic=~"$port"}[5m]))
unless on (host, nic)
(pingmesh_server_healthy < 1)

panels.title: Reachability

panels.description: Scrape interval for system-exporter metrics (named system_network_*), averaged over last 15 minutes
panels.title: system-exporter rate
